item.title: You can't put a number to love, but researchers estimated one
item.description: Working with data scientists from eHarmony, an online dating website, experts from University of Bath calculated that singletons have a one in 562 chance of finding love on any given day, considering they leave it entirely to fate. This was based on 18 key factors, such as desired age and physical attractiveness, which impact on the number of romantic options available to singles. 1 in 562 means less than 0.
